items.title: Using options to buy the recent dip in this used car retail stock
items.description: Options trader Nishant Pant identifies a buying opportunity in this used car seller.

items.title: The maker of Oreo cookies is a buy and can jump nearly 20%, Wells Fargo says
items.description: The bank upgraded stock to overweight rating from equal weight.

items.title: Tesla could reach $2 trillion in market cap by end of 2026 as autonomous era begins in Austin, says Dan Ives
items.description: Wedbush analyst Dan Ives sees a rally of over 55% ahead for Tesla.

items.title: Trump deportations are a headwind for this fast food stock, Stifel warns
items.description: Stifel lowered its rating on the stock to hold from buy.

items.title: Berkshire shares drop double digits as 'Buffett premium' disappears, and some expect more selling
